title: White House Honors 2015 Teacher Of The Year: Shanna Peeples
teaser: Shanna Peeples works at Palo Duro High School in Amarillo, Texas. Most of the students come from poor families. Some are refugees from East Africa â€” coming through the Kakuma refugee camp in Kenya.
